## RowGroup.Builder.updateCells() method

Update cells/downward growing cells, and resync slots with all (updated) cells

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

            cells?: Iterable<Cell.Builder>;
            downwardGrowingCells?: Iterable<Cell.Builder>;
        }): Builder;
```
